name: Hilton Winnipeg Airport Suites

reviews.text: I have been on the road for almost a week and am just ready to fly home. This hotel suite was absolutely spectacular. From the beautiful sitting area, the luxurious tub to the king bed. A great night's sleep. The hotel is located right by the airport and it was absolutely quiet. They gave me complimentary parking for my rental. A great way to end a business trip - in pure luxury.
reviews.title: The Best Hotel Room Ever!
Large Suites that won't break the bank
reviews.text: Well appointed large rooms, just 5 minutes from airport. Check-in was smooth & room was ready for an early check-in. Got upgraded for being an elite member which was nice.
Only negative would be that parking cost $9 a night & was very limited.
reviews.title: What?

reviews.text: Not the Hilton you experience in the states. Just ok.
reviews.title: Good value hotel near the airport

reviews.text: This is a very well run Hilton property that is located near the Winnipeg airport.
reviews.title: A change from downtown

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: About 10:30 there was an area black out. The hotel was pitch black, no emergency lighting. Then at 3:00 the fire alarm went off so everyone stood around in the foyer while the fiirefighters checked the hotel. Finally foolish us booked by the pool because we do not normally mind noise before 10 PM or after 8 AM but this morning had no sleep in before we left for our flight.
reviews.title: No Sleep For You

reviews.text: I know the hotel can not control everything but they should be prepared for emergencies and when guests are badly inconvenienced an apology and some appeasing gesture - free breakfast, discounted room, whatever - would be appreciated. On the positive side we could safely leave our car there for 13 nights at a cost and get free shuttle to the airport.
reviews.title: Sleeping disaster

reviews.text: I stayed for four nights at the Hilton. I am exhausted. The noise of people yelling up and down the hallway is horrendous. I've stayed at hundreds of hotels and until this week-end I didn't realize what a bad stay at a hotel really was. What an absolute nightmare. There are plenty of new hotels around this one, save yourself A really bad experience
reviews.title: Reservation let down....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I haven't even been there yet and I'm already so frustrated! My reservation was totally botched! Now my family of 5 and I have to squeeze into a room with only 2 double beds! What was supposed to be a fun and relaxing weekend is going to be very exausting with 5 grown people in 2 very small beds! Uuuuuuuhhhhh! Management was less that accomidating when I spoke with them about this issue. I just wish that people could get things right for ONCE! Very poor service so far. It will be interesting to see how the stay goes.....
reviews.title: Wonderful Experience

reviews.text: We stayed at this property the evening before flying out from the airport. The staff were welcoming and wanted to ensure that our stay was a pleasant experience.
reviews.title: Great location, close to airport and amenities.

reviews.text: I am a frequent Hilton guest, this was clearly the most disappointing Hilton I have ever stayed in. The hotel looked old and tired, the meal in the dining room, which I rarely utilize for just this reason was a disaster. The computers in the lobby to checking in for flight passes didn't operate, room was just average.
reviews.title: Kind of disappointed

reviews.text: Everything at check in went very smoothly. My parents had no trouble checking in early even though the room was reserved with my credit card. I was supposed to check in at 1pm, but my flight was late and I arrived at 4pm. There was no way to let the hotel know, but I had no problems at all when I arrived. Airport shuttle service came to get me in just 5 minutes after I called and the check in staff greeted me by name when I arrived and gave me my key. It was great to have everything hassle-free after a long flight.
reviews.title: Good service

reviews.text: The bed was amazingly soft!
reviews.title: Nice place near the airport

reviews.text: I was in Winnipeg for business and this hotel was the best location for my purposes. I loved that they shuttle came almost immediately when I called and the same person that answered the phone was the driver. The rooms were fine (like the extra sitting area) and they offer refrignerators, microwaves, coffee maker, etc. I only used the coffee maker, but still nice they offer the rest! It was windy when I was there and there is a vent in the bathroom that made some ghostly sounds - but nothing too bad. Had a small issue with the AC in the room, but it eventually cooled the room enough to be comfortable.
reviews.title: Rather shabby

reviews.text: Our flight got cancelled so we had to stay an extra night in Winnipeg. Because we were rebooked on a 6 a.m. flight, we chose to stay close to the airport. The Hilton Suites is a drab hotel that is right out of the 70s. The halls and stairway are pretty shabby with old carpet and scuffed up walls. The hotel has one of those indoor pools in the center that seems very passe to me. I had a an interior room facing the pool. It's very noisy when kids are yelling and splashing in the pool. Plus the room did not get cell phone reception.There was a big stain on the carpet.
reviews.title: quick stop

reviews.text: Had an opportunity to stay at this property even thought I live in the same city. Distance from home and event timing make the property attractive and convenient. Was concerned about pricing, but the facilities, staff, and environment were very good. No problem recommending this property to those who want close proximity to airport, but require a first class business stay experience.
reviews.title: Excellent property right under our nose

reviews.text: Good hotel. Very spacious room. Not as close to the malls or downtown. Polo Park is approx. 10 min car ride. Gym was okay...only 1 treadmill and 1 eliptical. Pool was decent size.
reviews.title: Good Hotel!

reviews.text: The hotel room was amazing. Large spacious bedroom with two double beds, large separate living area with pull-out couch, sink and minifridge. The hot tub is also very spacious. I've stayed here twice and everything has been great each time.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: We stayed one night at this hotel on April 8, 2012
reviews.title: Nice Hotel Close To Everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms was very good and clean. It had two rooms two tv's and the location to the airport was only a few moments drive by shuttle.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel and Friendly staff

aka: Hilton Suites Winnipeg Airport Hotel Winnipeg
